statements: DELETE FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE process_name = 'Cutting' AND start_date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE process_id = 10 AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM manufacturing_processes WHERE quality_standard = 'ISO 9001' AND start_date > '2021-06-15';
DELETE FROM Manufacturing WHERE facility_id = 100 AND product_name = 'Shoes';
DELETE FROM QualityControl WHERE pass_status = false AND test_type = 'Durability'
DELETE FROM Manufacturing_Records WHERE start_date < '2021-01-01' AND quantity_produced < 100;
